content:
Congratulations on scoring that 20% off coupon! I'd be happy to help you categorize your expenses. Can you please share the items you purchased at Target and their corresponding prices (before the coupon discount)? That way, I can help you categorize them into different budget categories, such as:

* Household essentials
* Personal care
* Clothing
* Electronics
* Home decor
* Food and beverages
* Entertainment
* Miscellaneous

Once we have the list, we can subtract the $15 discount from the total to get the final amount you paid. This will give you a clear picture of how much you spent in each category.
